Detailed Description

AttributeModel is a model class to display the attributes.

Model is for a table view with 2 columns: Name and value of the attribute. This model contains the attributes and holds them in a datastructure where they can be queried by other classes.

void AttributeModel::attributeChanged ( int  column  )  [signal]

This signal is emitted when an attribute changes in the model.

This is used to tell the view to resize it's columns to match the size of the items.

Parameters:
column Specifies which column of the attributeModel is changed.
